any.message: Skip link target exists

passes.description: Ensures <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have an accessible text
passes.help: <svg> elements with an img role must have an alternative text

any.message: Element has a child that is a title
aria-label attribute exists and is not empty

nodes.html: <svg focusable="false" class="mailto" role="img" aria-label="(link sends email)" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 10 70 20">

passes.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
passes.help: tables should not have the same summary and caption

none.message: Content of summary attribute and <caption> are not duplicated

passes.description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
passes.help: Table cells that use the headers attribute must only refer to cells in the same table

all.message: The headers attribute is exclusively used to refer to other cells in the table

passes.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
passes.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

all.message: All table header cells refer to data cells

incomplete.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
incomplete.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element's background color could not be determined because it's partially obscured by another element

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element's background color could not be determined because it's partially obscured by another element

any.message: Element's background color could not be determined because it's partially obscured by another element

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element's background color could not be determined because it's partially obscured by another element

any.message: Element's background color could not be determined due to a background image

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element's background color could not be determined due to a background image

violations.description: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

any.message: The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

violations.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
violations.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

relatedNodes.html: Visit our COVID-19 page for the latest updates on the pandemic response.

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.52:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #005da1, surrounding text: #1b1b1b)

relatedNodes.html: Visit our COVID-19 page for the latest updates on the pandemic response.

any.message: The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.52:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #005da1, surrounding text: #1b1b1b)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

violations.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
violations.help: Page should contain a level-one heading

all.message: Page must have a level-one heading

Fix all of the following:
